product_name: Aquaglide Cascade Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 12' 6"
long_description: A totally unique alternative to a full-size epoxy board, the Cascade Inflatable Paddle Board has a long, fast waterline that paddles smoothly and tracks straight, especially on flatwater.
short_description: A totally unique alternative to a full-size epoxy board, the Cascade Inflatable Paddle Board has a long, fast waterline that paddles smoothly and tracks straight, especially on flatwater.
